meanings.definition: A person who specializes in stenography, particularly using a stenotype machine to transcribe spoken words quickly and accurately.
meanings.sent1: The stenotypists at the courthouse transcribed the witness testimonies with great speed.
meanings.sent2: The stenotypists in the office are always in demand for their efficient transcription skills.
meanings.sent3: The stenotypists at the conference had to transcribe the speaker's jokes accurately to capture the humor.
meanings.sent4: The stenotypists' fingers danced on the keys of the stenotype machine, turning words into text effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The stenotypists' ability to transcribe conversations in real-time amazed everyone in the room.
